resources.string: Schedule a brainstorming session for the marketing team.
Prepare slides for next weekâ€™s meeting. The focus should be on highlighting key milestones and providing visuals for the timeline.
Add a task to refactor the user dashboard UI code for improved performance. We need to reduce the load time and ensure compatibility across all devices.
Create a task to design icons for the new feature set. Ensure that each icon is intuitive, consistent with the existing UI style, and easy to scale across different screen sizes.
